publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-781 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Business Motion-That the Parliament agrees- (a) that the Justice 1 Committee reports to the Justice 2 Committee by 30 January 2004 on the Title Conditions (Scotland) Act 2003 (Conservation Bodies) Amendment Order 2003 (SSI 2003/621); and (b) that consideration of the Fire Sprinklers in Residential Premises (Scotland) Bill at Stage 1 be completed by 30 April 2004. Supported by: Tavish Scott*
